На данный момент мы предлагаем 3 основны: At the moment we offer 3 main types of services
Основная деятельность нашей компании. До: The main activity of our company. We will deliver goods within 14 days from Shenzhen to any city in the Russian Federation. We solve all the issues that arise along the way ourselves. Upon first request, we provide information about the location and status of your goods. Loading in China and unloading on site is carried out by our specialists. At the stage of cargo acceptance, we carry out quality control and resolve the issue ourselves with our Chinese colleagues.
Помогаем начать товарный бизнес с Китаем: We help you start a commodity business with China. We'll tell you which goods are best to choose to start your business, how to establish contact with the supplier and what problems may arise at customs. Are you planning to bring dangerous or specific goods from China? We'll explain what problems to expect and how to consult We provide a discount on transport services.
Обеспечиваем готовность всей таможенной: We ensure the readiness of all customs documentation. If problems arise, our legal department will easily solve the difficulties that arise. If necessary, we affix the necessary markings to your product.
Перевозка грузов любой сложности из Шень: Transportation of cargo of any complexity from Shenzhen to all cities of Russia
Сопровождение грузов и решение любых про: Cargo escorting and solving any problems en route
Возим грузы любых габаритов и хрупкости: We transport cargo of any size and fragility from Shenzhen and Guangzhou to anywhere in Russia. Controlled receipt of goods, we ensure their safety and reliable packaging.
Контейнер пропал в пути? При погрузке уп: Container lost on the way? Did boxes fall during loading and fragile goods became unusable? Has your cargo been stuck at customs for a month? This does not happen with us - we ensure ideal delivery speed and cargo safety.
Берём на себя всю бумажную волокиту. Офо: We take care of all the paperwork. We register the cargo, pay the necessary duties, and ensure that the necessary markings are present. We will coordinate all documents with you.
